cohort: ER+/HER2- MBC, 2L, Site B, by Provider (2024–2025)
summary: Dr. Johnson has a 18% CDK4/6i utilization rate, 17% below Site B average. Targeted intervention could yield $30,000/year.

suggestions: Share best practices from Dr. Kim with Dr. Johnson
